alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Taylor; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 2:11PM EDT until May 15 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 211 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles east of St. Marks, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scanlon, Econfina, Goose Pasture, Hells Half Acre, Cabbage Grove and Fanlew. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
